subject: Baseball
Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: After spending the past year coming back from Tommy John surgery, Orioles catcher Matt Wieters has a new perspective, and a few theories, on an operation normally performed on pitchers.
snippet: After spending the past year coming back from Tommy John surgery, Orioles catcher Matt Wieters has a new perspective, and a few theories, on an operation normally performed on pitchers.
